author: _shemnon
content:
"I believe major minors" nearly burned us with the Muir Glacier fork. 
 We did that with basically no service provider input and the feedback was the timing was problematic. If we have actual service provider and miner feedback that an earlier release is preferred then that's great. But too often we make these calls just on client team input without sufficient "downstream" considerations.
